When you see me, you know me. Or the famous chronicle historie of King Henry the eight, with the birth and vertuous life of Edward Prince of Wales As it was playd by the high and mightie Prince of Wales his seruants. By Samvell Rovvly, seruant to the Prince. Rowley, Samuel, d. 1633?
[84] p.
Imprinted [by H. Lownes and others] for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yeard neare Saint Austines gate, London : 1605.
Printers from STC. Signatures: A-K⁴ L² . Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
